name: Space Dandy - Gameboy Fangame
description:
PRESS SPACEBAR ON SPLASH SCREEN/TITLE SCREEN.

AGDG demoday 4 submission

Space Dandy fangame I started as a result of the gbjam that was recently.

Primarily a top-down shooter - main inspiration is a small game called "a spaceshooter for 5 bucks"

As for this demo and the games current development state.
Gameplay is essentially finished besides a few more bosses and balance issues with the weapon upgrade system and spawning system.

Cutscenes and wacky antics of the the cast of space dandy are at a bare minimum in this. - sorry those that wanted to mainly see that stuff.

This DEMO is showing off the gameplay and as such, is an arcade/survival gamemode rather than a narrative driven level structure aimed for the final release.

Select one of three ships

Select one of 4 weapon types

Fight enemies to gain wulongs

After a time, a boss will spawn and you can keep going.

Thats all I'm afraid.

Arrow keys are movements.

Holding down spacebar is shoot

M is special move - limited ammo

Sure you can work out the rest by playing,

have fun...
